overview: Japanese laserdisc release from 1988.  Zbigniew Rybczynski - "Steps"  Mary Lucier - "If I Could Fly, I Would Fly"  Gary Hill - "Primarily Speaking"  Maureen Nappi - "Beat Plus One" / "Color Slivers" / "Synchro-Swivel"  Isaac Abrams - "From Vivaldi's Four Seasons Spring"  Dan Reeves - "A Mosaic for the Kali Yuga"  David Daniels - "Buzz Box"  Charlex - Nickelodeon promos  Jet Propulsion Laboratory - "L.A.: The Movie"  Hart Perry - "A.F.R.I.C.A."
title: American Videoart Anthology Vol. 2
